page.title: 08 St.Marys Church - Exterior
page.content: The{Yew Tree}in the graveyard is over 1500 years old and is one of the oldest in Britain even though we have no certain proof of its age. Though lots of it has rotted it is still living but is not very healthy. The{Lytch Gate,}or gate of the dead was so named because coffins were carried through on their way to burial;it is 100 years old. The{Sundial}in the graveyard dates back to 1700. Most of the graves are facing East to wait for the second coming of Jesus. There have been quite a few things added to the church in the past 5 years; like the new roof which has only just been completed and the lanterns which have given in memory of loved ones.
